body.p:
Louisville Ky Dec 12/64
His Excellency T. Bramlette
Sir

I take pleasure in recommending to you W N Hogan of Grant Co Ky., who is my travelling Agent to assist me in getting up lists and Claims for slaves in military services who desires an appointment of Notary Public for the State at large to facilitate me in the business of my office

Yours very respectfully
Jas. P. Flint
Agent

P. S. Please forward as soon as possible if you make the appointment enclosed you find two dollars Clerks fees.
J. P. F.

Notary Public
State at large
W. A. Hogan
apptd
13th Dec/64
